com.code.aon.common.dao.sql
Class AbstractDAO

java.lang.Object
  com.code.aon.common.AbstractFieldMapper
      com.code.aon.common.dao.sql.AbstractDAO

public abstract class AbstractDAO
extends AbstractFieldMapper

This abstract class access to the DataSource. Only this class can access.

Since:
1.0
